WorkflowInfo.Name: Resize Cluster Capacity
WorkflowInfo.Description: Resize volumes, cluster wide, from a used size percentage threshold

WorkflowInfo.Details:
Information

This workflow finds all volumes in a cluster with a free disk space capacity lower than a specified percentage, and resizes the volume to match a required capacity. This workflow should be triggered by a Self Service request.

Requirements:
* NetApp module is configured and Up.

Input Variables (variables recieved from the Self Service request):
* NetApp Cluster
* Used Percentage Threshold
* Target Used Percentage

Output
A report table of all modified volumes previous znd current sizes (MB).
